info.title: Träwelling API
info.description:
Träwelling user API description. This is an incomplete documentation with still many errors. The
 *      API is currently not yet stable. Endpoints are still being restructured. Both the URL and the request or body
 *      can be changed. Breaking changes will be announced on the Discord server: https://discord.gg/72t7564ZbV

get.summary: Get authenticated user information
get.description: Get all profile information about the authenticated user

post.description:
This request issues a new Bearer-Token with a new expiration date while also revoking the old
     *      token.

get.summary: [Auth optional] Get basic information for event
get.description: Returns slug, name and duration for an event

404.description: No Event found for this id

get.description: Returns overall travelled distance and duration for an event

404.description: No Event found for this id

Returns paginated statuses of the authenticated user, that are more than 20 minutes in the

get.summary: User state
get.description: This request returns whether the currently logged-in user has an active check-in or not.

404.description: No active checkin

get.summary: Show all tags for a status which are visible for the current user
get.description: Returns a collection of all visible tags for the given status, if user is authorized

404.description: No status found for this id

403.description: User not authorized to access this status

post.description:
Creates a single StatusTag Object, if user is authorized to.

The key of a tag is free * text. You can choose it as you need it. However, please use a namespace for tags * (namespace:xxx) that only affect your own application.

For tags related to standard actions * we recommend the following tags in the trwl namespace:
  • trwl:seat (i.e. 61)
  • trwl:wagon * (i.e. 25)
  • trwl:ticket (i.e. BahnCard 100 first))
  • trwl:travel_class (i.e. 1, 2, business, * economy, ...)
  • trwl:locomotive_class (BR424, BR450)
  • trwl:wagon_class (i.e. Bpmz)

404.description: No status found for this id

403.description: User not authorized to manipulate this status

get.summary: Show all tags for multiple statuses which are visible for the current user
get.description: Returns a collection of all visible tags for the given statuses, if user is authorized

403.description: User not authorized to access this

put.description: Updates a single StatusTag Object, if user is authorized to

404.description: No status found for this id

403.description: User not authorized to manipulate this status

delete.description: Deletes a single StatusTag Object, if user is authorized to

404.description: No status found for this id and statusId

403.description: User not authorized to manipulate this status

get.summary: Get departures from a station
get.description: Get departures from a station

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the station (replace slashes with spaces)

parameters.name: when
parameters.description:
When to get the departures (default: now).
      If you omit the timezone, the datetime is interpreted as localtime.
          This is especially helpful when träwelling abroad.

items.description:
HAFAS Train model. This model might be subject to unexpected changes. See also
     *                     external documentation at
     *                     [https://v5.db.transport.rest/api.html#get-stopsiddepartures](https://v5.db.transport.rest/api.html#get-stopsiddepartures).

404.description: Station not found

get.summary: Get the stopovers and trip information for a given train

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: start point from where the stopovers should be desplayed

404.description: No station found

503.description: There has been an error with our data provider

get.summary: Location based search for trainstations
get.description: Returns the nearest station to the given coordinates

404.description: No station found

503.description: There has been an error with our data provider

put.summary: Set a station as home station

404.description: Station not found

get.summary: Autocomplete for trainstations
get.description:
This request returns an array of max. 10 station objects matching the query. **CAUTION:** All
     *      slashes (as well as encoded to %2F) in {query} need to be replaced, preferrably by a space (%20)

503.description: There has been an error with our data provider

get.summary: History for trainstations
get.description:
This request returns an array of max. 10 most recent station objects that the user has arrived
     *      at.

delete.description: Deletes the Account for the user and all posts created by it

confirmation.title: confirmation
confirmation.description:
Username of the to be deleted account (needs to match the currently logged in
     *                  user)

409.description: Conflict. This should not happen but it tries to prevent a 500.

403.description: User not authorized to do this action

get.summary: [Auth optional] Get paginated statuses for single user
get.description: Returns paginated statuses of a single user specified by the username

403.description: Forbidden, User is blocked

get.summary: [Auth optional] Get information for single user
get.description: Returns general information, metadata and statistics for a user

403.description: Forbidden, User is blocked

404.description: User not found

post.description:
Block a specific user. That user will not be able to see your statuses or profile information,
     *      and cannot send you follow requests. Public statuses are still visible through the incognito mode.

403.description: User not authorized

404.description: User not found

delete.description:
Unblock a specific user. They are now able to see your statuses and profile information again,
     *      and send you follow requests.

403.description: User not authorized

404.description: User not found

post.description:
Mute a specific user. That way they will not be shown on your dashboard and in the active
     *      journeys tab

403.description: User not authorized

delete.description:
Unmute a specific user. That way they will be shown on your dashboard and in the active
     *      journeys tab again

403.description: User not authorized

get.summary: Get paginated statuses for single user
get.description: Returns paginated statuses of a single user specified by the username

get.summary: Get webhooks for current user and current application
get.description: Returns all webhooks which are created for the current user and which the current authorized applicaton has access to.

get.summary: Get single webhook
get.description: Returns a single webhook Object, if user and application is authorized to see it

404.description: No webhook found or unauthorized for this id

delete.summary: Delete a webhook if the user and application are authorized to do

404.description: No webhook found for this id

403.description: User or application not authorized to delete this webhook

token.title: token
token.description: Bearer Token. Use in Authentication-Header with prefix 'Bearer '. (space is needed)

expires_at.description: end of life for this token. Lifespan is usually one year.

begin.title: begin

ibnr.description:
If true, the `start` and `destination` properties can be supplied as an ibnr. Otherwise they
     *     should be given as the Träwelling-ID. Default behavior is `false`.

force.title: force
force.description:
If true, the checkin will be created, even if a colliding checkin exists. No points will be
     *     awarded.

arrival.description: currently known arrival time. Equal to arrivalReal if known. Else equal to arrivalPlanned.

currently known departure time. Equal to departureReal if known. Else equal to

manualArrival.description: Manual arrival time set by the user

BusinessEnum.title: Business
BusinessEnum.description: What type of travel (0=private, 1=business, 2=commute) did the user specify?

MapProviderEnum.title: MapProvider
MapProviderEnum.description: What type of map provider (cargo, open-railway-map) did the user specify?

MastodonVisibilityEnum.title: visibility
MastodonVisibilityEnum.description:
What type of visibility (0=public, 1=unlisted, 2=followers, 3=private) did the user specify for
 *     future posts to Mastodon? Some instances such as chaos.social discourage bot posts on public timelines.

PointsReasonEnum.title: PointsReason
PointsReasonEnum.description: What is the reason for the points calculation factor? (0=in time => 100%, 1=good enough => 25%, 2=not sufficient (1 point), 3=forced => no points)

VisibilityEnum.title: visibility
VisibilityEnum.description:
What type of visibility (0=public, 1=unlisted, 2=followers, 3=private, 4=authenticated) did the
 *     user specify?

passport.description: OAuth2 authorizationCode Flow. Get your token from https://traewelling.de/settings/applications. Set the redirect URL to https://traewelling.de/api/oauth2-callback to use it here. See also https://laravel.com/docs/9.x/passport

scopes.write-notifications: mark notifications as read, clear notifications
scopes.write-followers: accept follow requests and remove followers
scopes.write-blocks: block and unblock users, mute and unmute users
scopes.write-support-tickets: create support tickets in your name
scopes.read-settings-profile: see your profile data, e.g. email
scopes.extra-terminate-sessions: log you out of other sessions and apps

token.description: Enter token in format "Bearer \<token\>". You can create your personal access token at https://traewelling.de/settings/applications. We recommend this method for prototyping purposes. For all other use cases please use the oAuth method above.
token.name: Authorization

tags.name: Checkin
